tools

Class GMLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • tools.GMLHelper

  • public class GMLHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Auxiliary class for GML constants / helper method definitions that are shared by other GML-related classes.
    Author:
    "Kostiantyn Kucher"

      • escapeHtml

        public static java.lang.String escapeHtml(java.lang.String string)
        Performs escaping for some reserved HTML symbols
        Parameters:
        string - String to perform escaping for
        Returns:
        valid HTML string to be used in GML file

      • composeLabelAttributes

        public static java.lang.String composeLabelAttributes(java.lang.String entityName,
                                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
        Composes a fancy-looking HTML label for given entity and its attributes
        Parameters:
        entityName - entity name to be displayed with large font
        attributes - map of entity attributes (and their values)
        Returns:
        label to be used in GML node definition

      • composeAttributes

        public static java.lang.String composeAttributes(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
        Composes HTML representation for attributes key-values
        Parameters:
        attributes - map of entity attributes (and their values)
        Returns:
        HTML code to be used in GML label definition

      • composeLabelComplexAttributes

        public static java.lang.String composeLabelComplexAttributes(java.lang.String entityName,
                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>> attributes)
        Composes a fancy-looking HTML label for given entity and its composite attributes
        Parameters:
        entityName - entity name to be displayed with large font
        attributes - map of entity attributes (and their values)
        Returns:
        label to be used in GML node definition

      • composeTableHeader

        public static java.lang.String composeTableHeader(java.lang.String label)
        Composes a label and a top part of HTML table to use for nested structures visualization.
        Parameters:
        label - entity description to use on the top of the table
        Returns:
        the upper part of HTML table to use in GML Signature / Environment description
